channel.title: Mp3 player for the client
channel.description:
hi,
i was wondering if it was possible to add a mp3 player to a delta client so you could make a music folder and add a couple of songs there to build up a pretty decent music system with all kinds of genres. it'd be nice if you could help me out with some codes instead of just saying "yh it's possible" or "naw". i've also googled this topic and i have also used the search bar multiple times. (no "uze srchbar no0b" pls.)
thanks, max

item.title: Mp3 player for the client
item.dc:creator: @DeltaMax DeltaMax
item.description:
@DeltaMax wrote:

hi,

i was wondering if it was possible to add a mp3 player to a delta client so
you could make a music folder and add a couple of songs there to build up a pretty decent music system
with all kinds of genres.
it’d be nice if you could help me out with some codes instead of just saying “yh it’s possible” or “naw”.

thanks, max
